title: Paywall Page UX/UI
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user finished Select Favorite Teams and Notifications on-boarding or tapped on a video
custom_steps: WHEN the user hits the Paywall
custom_expected:
THEN the app will display the following:

* First Pitch logo and background
* $49.99 Yearly button
* $12.99 Monthly button
* Subscriber Login button
* 'Already Purchased? Restore Now' link
* Close button

THEN the app will display the page complete and neat (no typographical errors, no overlapping and/or missing icons)

THEN the wait time for the page to load will not be longer than 5 secs

THEN the app will display the content of that tab in a scale to fit manner (the user will not be able to pinch in/out of the page)

THEN the users will be able to click on buttons/elements and these will work

title: User Account Page UX/UI
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user finished Select Favorite Teams and Notifications on-boarding or tapped on a video
custom_steps: WHEN the user hits the User Account page
custom_expected:
THEN the app will display the 'Log In With Your MiLB.com Account' Form

THEN the app will display the page complete and neat (no typographical errors, no overlapping and/or missing icons)

THEN the wait time for the page to load will not be longer than 5 secs

THEN the app will display the content of that tab in a scale to fit manner (the user will not be able to pinch in/out of the page)

THEN the users will be able to click on buttons/elements and these will work

title: Paywall Page - No Apple ID Logged In
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the app brought the user to the Paywall page

GIVEN that the user has no Apple ID logged in

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on $49.99 Yearly button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will display the 'Sign-In Required' popup

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on $12.99 Yearly button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will display the 'Sign-In Required' popup

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on Subscriber Login button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will display the Log in With Your MiLB Account Page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on 'Already Purchased? Restore Now' link
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will display the 'Sign In to iTunes Store' popup

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on Close button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will dismiss the Paywall page

title: Paywall Page - An Apple ID Logged In
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the app brought the user to the Paywall page

GIVEN that the user has an Apple ID logged in

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on $49.99 Yearly button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will display the 'Confirm Purchase' popup

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on $12.99 Yearly button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will display the 'Confirm Purchase' popup

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on Subscriber Login button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will display the Log in With Your MiLB Account Page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on 'Already Purchased? Restore Now' link
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will display the 'Purchase Restored Successfully' popup (account with entitlement)

THEN the app will display the 'Failed to restore purchase' popup (account without entitlement)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on Close button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will dismiss the Paywall page

title: Purchase In Old App Then Download New App
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user purchased a subscription in the old app

GIVEN that the user downloaded a newer version of the app
custom_steps: WHEN the user restore purchases from the old app and use it in the new app
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be able to restore purchases

THEN the user will have the same subscription from the old app

THEN the user will have access to MiLB.TV

title: Purchase In Web Then Use In Mobile App
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user purchased MiLB.TV in web
custom_steps: WHEN the user logs in the account with entitlement/purchased subscription in the mobile app
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be able to use the entitled account in the app

THEN the user will be able to access MiLB.TV

title: $49.99 Subscriber
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user is currently subscribed to $49.99 subscription 

GIVEN that the app displayed the Paywall

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on '$49.99 Yearly'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will display the 'You're currently subscribed to this.' popup

THEN the app will display the 'Manage' and 'OK' buttons

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on 'Manage' button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be brought to Apple Store and will allow the user to manage the current subscriptions

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on 'OK' button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will dismiss the popup

THEN the app will not make any changes on the current subscription of the user

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on '$12.99 Monthly'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will display the 'Confirm Purchase' popup

THEN the app will display the 'Cancel' and 'Continue' buttons

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on 'Continue'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will display the 'You're all set.' popup

THEN the app will save the newly modified subscription preference

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on 'Cancel' button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will dismiss the popup

THEN the app will not make any changes on the current subscription of the user

title: $12.99 Subscriber
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user is currently subscribed to $12.99 subscription

GIVEN that the app displayed the Paywall

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on '$12.99 Monthly'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will display the 'You're currently subscribed to this.' popup

THEN the app will display the 'Manage' and 'OK' buttons

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on 'Manage' button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be brought to Apple Store and will allow the user to manage the current subscriptions

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on 'OK' button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will dismiss the popup

THEN the app will not make any changes on the current subscription of the user

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on '$49.99 Yearly'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
HEN the app will display the 'Confirm Purchase' popup

THEN the app will display the 'Cancel' and 'Continue' buttons

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on 'Continue'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will display the 'You're all set.' popup

THEN the app will save the newly modified subscription preference

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on 'Cancel' button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will dismiss the popup

THEN the app will not make any changes on the current subscription of the user

title: Restore Subscription
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user is currently subscribed to any subscription

GIVEN that the app displayed the Paywall
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on 'Already Purchased? Restore Now' link button
custom_expected:
THEN the app will display the 'Purchase Restored Successfully'

THEN the user will be able to access MiLB.TV
